p: The elucidation of potential targets could lead to COVID-19-specific treatments ( Figure 11). Approaches to anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development include (a) inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 entry, (b) disruption of SARS-CoV-2 +ssRNA synthesis after entry, (c) inflammatory response suppression, and (d) disruption of SARS-CoV-2 translation.
